info.title: Putin has announced the further development of the Arctic fleet.
In Berlin, farmers again protested
The United States is disappointed by Hungary ' s ratification of Sweden ' s NATO membership
U.S.A. has called for "scoiling," Zaharova stated
Russian vessels will start filling unusual fuels
The Russian exodus became the largest British taxpayer.
Somali pirates intensified with attacks in the Red Sea
The Telegraph: Putin ' s visit to Kaliningrad frightened the West
"Rose to his grave." The European Union will punish Hungary because of Ukraine.
"Lucil" has increased his share of "El5-Energo."
NATO revealed the chances of Moldova joining the EU by 2030
The manufacturer described the adoption of the Circon missile.
The range of the Onicus cruise missile will increase significantly
In the Ministry of Defence, the Russian weapons have been improved.
Russia ' s space forces will build rocket launchers
The Ministry of Defence reported new arms transfers in 2024
In Russia, duties for wheat exports will increase
Rosstat recorded an increase in egg production after 2023.
The Ministry of Defence evaluated the implementation of the plan for the transfer of new equipment to the Russian army.
The media revealed what assistance can be given to Kyiv under NATO exercises
Shoig described the increase in the production of weapons and ammunition in Russia
The Shogu assessed the development of the infrastructure of nuclear deterrence forces in Russia
"Six millions of migrants: in the United States, Baden's policy has been hated.
In protests, farmers in France began to rob shops, reported to the media.
Up to 80 per cent of the jobs generated by young companies, Chernichenko stated

In Russia, a dron-convertoplan "Lovine."
Putin instructed to amend the law on benefits for family members of the German Russian Federation
In the United States, the Russians and China have declared a space threat.
Russia maintained the fifth largest steel rating.
